java.lang.Object

public class MethodContextCodeFragment extends Object implements CodeFragment
Representation of method code fragment

    • compareExportLocationAggregations

      public Set<String> compareExportLocationAggregations(CodeFragment codeFragment)
      Compares this (method code fragment) and another code fragment representations according to their imported dependencies (ExportLocationAggregation objects)
      Specified by:
      compareExportLocationAggregations in interface CodeFragment
      Parameters:
      codeFragment - - an instance of CodeFragment that is compared according to its imports
      Returns:
      the set of not matched exports from imports aggregation from this method in comparison with the one (from another code fragment) provided in argument
